duties_responsibilities.duty: Sustain and improve wafer fab equipment in support of existing and new processes in production facilities
Support new and established equipment sets as well as new platforms
Develop and apply extensive equipment knowledge and job skills to complete complex, specialized assignments
Participate in equipment improvement and optimization processes as part of the Equipment Team

education_certification.credential: Associates of Science degree or higher in Electronics Technology, Mechanical Engineering, Applied Science, Electro-mechanical Technology or equivalent
